name: Porygon
author: Tomoaki Imakuni
flavor_text: Using the most advanced technologies, scientists finally succeeded in making the first artificial Pokémon.

attacks.name: Conversion 3
attacks.effect: Choose {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D}, {M}, {Y}, or {N} type. The Defending Pokémon’s Weakness is now that type until the end of your next turn. (The amount of Weakness doesn’t change.)
